description: This script validates the readiness of a FastAPI backend by checking imports, starting a temporary server, and performing a health check endpoint probe.

classes.name: uvicorn.Server
classes.description: Uvicorn server class used to run the FastAPI application in a subprocess.

methods.name: _port
methods.description: Retrieves the port number from environment variable 'PORT' or defaults to 3001.

methods.name: _check_imports
methods.description: Checks if required modules (fastapi, uvicorn) and the application import are successful.

methods.name: _wait_port
methods.description: Waits until the specified host and port are available or timeout occurs.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Main function that runs the import checks, starts the server, and performs the health check.
